summary: An introvert, indifferent woman joins a high school as a student teacher, under supervision of a shameless, nymphomaniac man who is a year younger than her. On a school trip, the supervisor... See full summary »
cast: Hae-il Park|Yeong-gi Jeong|Hye-jeong Kang|Ja-yeong Kim|Se-dong Kim|Dae-yeon Lee|Greena Park|Young-hwa Seo
title: Yeonae-ui mokjeok
